title: Gen AI - Portfolio bot
description: This project describes an LLAMA3-powered portfolio bot that answer questions related to the portfolio owner and their areas of expertise.

title: Invoice Extraction Bot
description: This project aims to develop a system that utilizes LangChain and LLAMA2 to extract data from invoices when a user uploads an attachment.

title: Drug-Target Interaction Prediction using GNNs
description: Employed Seismic Architecture, Graph Attention Networks (GAT), and Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) within a Graph Neural Network (GNN) to develop a classifier for predicting Drug-Target Interactions.
